thag6.12:1.1_0: From where would anger come for one free of anger,
thag6.12:1.3_0: Such a one is at peace,
thag6.12:2.3_0: An angry person swapped with anger;
thag6.12:5.2_0: reflect on the simile of the saw;
thag6.12:5.3_0: if craving for flavors arises in you,
thag6.12:5.4_0: remember the simile of the child’s flesh.
thag6.12:6.1_0: If your mind seems to me,
thag6.12:6.2_0: to sensual pleasures and future lives,
thag6.12:6.4_0: as one would curb a greedy cow eating corn.
